result.title: Insightful tutorial on Centroid Decomposition of a Tree
result.content:
Hello CodeForces Community!

I felt Centroid Decomposition as a very interesting and powerful technique when I first come along it. My friend, tanujkhattar has written a well designed and insightful blog on it. Also, I am including some other resources that can be very well found on CF only.

Links:

  1. https://threads-iiith.quora.com/Centroid-Decomposition-of-a-Tree
  2. http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/10533
  3. http://ipsc.ksp.sk/2009/real/solutions/l.html
  4. http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/12982
  5. http://petr-mitrichev.blogspot.com/2015/03/this-week-in-competitive-programming_22.html
